::: Black Aracnia ignored the small battle going on. She looked at the deep 
tunnle Inferno was digging. At the sound of gun fire he poped up and demanded 
to know what to do. She looked at him and with the snap of her leg sent him 
falling down. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: Keep digging! Rampage, get down there!

::: Rampage, brooding and hostile lept into the hole, and then the Fembot 
took one last look at Cyber claw and felt a twinge of sadness for her. Black 
Aracnia then lept into the hole. :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Inferno ::: How dare you throw me down! The Royalty shall be disple-

::: Black Aracnia, holding a flash light ::: Can it! We need to get into the 
Maximal H.Q. now! Rampage, at the end of the shaft is bedrock, through the 
bedrock is the hull of the Maxi's headquarters. Destroy that wall and were in!

:: Rampage transformed into his tank mode. With the snapp hiss he sent three 
large missles zooming into the rock wall and it exploded with a mindnumbing 
bang. Smoke filled the shaft. :::

::: Black Aracnia ::: Now, move! Go Go Go!

::: The three Predacons advanced and entered the smoking remains of what 
appeared to be a supply closet. :::

::: Inferno ::: Trapped! We have failed!

::: Rampage ::: Wheres the door?

:::: Balck Aracnia ::: Both of you get off of me!

::: Inferno ::: I have failed the Queen!

::: With a screach, the door fell and Rampage moved out first, into the 
corridor of the Maximal fortress. :::
